column4: Could someone explain to me why I have a lot of files under my / directory, except for my home folder
I mean, could I minimize the files being placed in the folder.
/ is where everything is including /home
yeah
That is why I said "except for my home folder"
It takes a lot of my drive space.
Read up on FHS
FHS?
Filesystem Hierarchy Standard
I'm reading it right now
but, my question is, can I remove files that are not being used
like what?
I don't know what are these files
There are so many of them
I'm still new to Linux.
first of all in chat, type my nick to make sure I see your conversation
give me an example
: what sample?
of a file you want to delete
: That's my problem. I don't know which file(s) to delete.
then do them all and see what happens
: I really want to learn linux. This will be my strength if ever I graduate in college.
